content: ► chili pepper - look at how cute this little chili pepper amigurumi is why not make one for a person close to your heart you can find instructions oh how to make one just like this on our channel and don t forget to subscribe for even more instructive videos ► we would love to see your finished amigurumi so please share a picture with us tag us @amiguworld and use the hashtag #amiguworld on instagram be sure to add amiguworld on social media sites ☑️ facebook https //www facebook com/amiguworld69/ ☑️ website https //amiguworld com/ ☑️ instagram https //www instagram com/amiguworld/ ☑️ twitter https //twitter com/amiguworld ♥️♥️♥️ thank you very much ♥️♥️♥️
